title: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Doujin-ban
original_name: かぐや様は告らせたい 同人版
sinopse:
Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai is a manga about "the war of love and brains" between two high school geniuses who try to make the other confess. This, however, is an "ero spinoff" that'll make you wish it were part of the main series!

(Source: Jaimini's Box)
